data.caption: Audited Results
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that in terms of Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Audited Results for the year ended 31st March 2023 have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors at their respective meetings held on 25th May 2023. The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 14.00 hours and concluded at 16.15 hours.

We are sending herewith the textual matter of Audited Financial Results for the year ended 31st March 2023. The Audit Report issued by M/s. S R Batliboi & Associates, LLP, Chennai, the Statutory Auditors with respect to the audited financial results and declaration for audit report with unmodified opinion are enclosed. The results would also be uploaded in the Company's website www.esabindia.com.

Kindly take the information on record.
